title: 3dRankizer
description: Tool to rank each voxel as sorted into increasing value. Ties get the average rank.

mask.title: Mask dataset
mask.description: Use the specified dataset as a mask. Only voxels with nonzero values in this mask will be used from the input dataset. Voxels outside the mask will get rank 0.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Write results into float-format output dataset

percentize.title: Percentize
percentize.description: Divide rank by the number of voxels in the dataset and multiply by 100.0

percentize_mask.title: Percentize with mask
percentize_mask.description: Divide rank by the number of voxels in the mask and multiply by 100.0
